definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
moving average index (used in financial analysis)
moving average index (used in financial analysis)
pinyin: yi2 dong4 ping2 jun1 xian4 zhi3 biao1
guan1 jian4 ji4 xiao4 zhi3 biao1

sentences.english: In technical side, short and mid-term technical indicators keep on rise.
sentences.chinese: 技術面，短期及中期各項技術指標保持多頭強勢狀態。

sentences.english: The major technique norms have over taken those of importations.
sentences.chinese: 主要技術指標超過原進口產品。

sentences.english: The serum MBP and moisture in brain tissues were observed as index.
sentences.chinese: 以血清MBP和腦組織含水量作爲觀察指標。

sentences.english: Objective To further discuss the indexes which can be used to objectively appraise the rat myocardial ischemia models.
sentences.chinese: 目的進一步探討客觀評價大鼠心肌缺血模型的指標。

sentences.english: Thalli concentration is a key quality index in microbial growth process.
sentences.chinese: 菌體濃度是微生物生長過程中關鍵的質量指標。

sentences.english: The white half moon at the beginning of the nail is an indicator of good thyroid health.
sentences.chinese: 在指甲底端的白色半月形，是一個甲狀腺健康的指標。

sentences.english: Heat surroundings cosiness index is a important target of energy efficiency design in buildings.
sentences.chinese: 熱環境舒適度指標是建築節能設計的關鍵之一。

sentences.english: Some physiological indices of Rana plancyi plancyi were tested before and after hibernation.
sentences.chinese: 實驗測定了金線蛙冬眠前後幾項生理指標。

sentences.english: P16 protein may serve as an important indicator of estimating prognosis of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: P16可作爲臨牀上判定乳腺癌預後的一個新指標。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the study on haemogram and blood biochemical parameters of 12 healthy Sichuan golden monkeys (Rhinopithecus roxellanae).
sentences.chinese: 測定了12只川金絲猴的血象和血液生物化學指標。

sentences.english: Serum TC level is a sensitive contacting biomarker of excessive iodine.
sentences.chinese: 血脂爲高碘接觸的最敏感指標。

sentences.english: Consumption rate is an important macroeconomic index used to reflect economic condition.
sentences.chinese: 消費率是反映國民經濟運行狀況的重要宏觀經濟指標。

sentences.english: Quotas of the means of production are allocated by the higher administrative bodies to the lower ones.
sentences.chinese: 物資指標按隸屬關係分配。

sentences.english: Other standard metrics also fit the interception pattern.
sentences.chinese: 其他的指標同樣適合截取模式。

sentences.english: Cholera was recognized as an indicator of how well the environment is managed.
sentences.chinese: 霍亂被視爲可衡量環境治理成果的一項指標。

sentences.english: AIRSPEED BUGS, Adjustable pointers on the airspeed indicator.
sentences.chinese: 空速遊標，空速表上的可調指標。

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1

definition: Brooklyn, borough of New York City
to refer to/see also/compare (cf.)/to pay respect to
